name: Boots of Striding
text: During your movement, add +2 Move to the movement.

name: Winged Shoes
text: During your movement, add Jump to the movement.

name: Hide Armor
text: On the next two sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Leather Armor
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
text: During your turn, gain INVISIBLE.

name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
text: During your attack, gain Advantage on the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
text: When attacked, consider any 2x attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a +0 instead.

name: Heater Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Piercing Bow
text: During your ranged attack, ignore all Shield values for the entire Attack action.

name: War Hammer
text: During your melee attack, add STUN to the entire Attack action.

name: Poison Dagger
text: During your melee attack, add POISON to a single action.

name: Minor Healing Potion
text: During your turn, Heal 3 damage.

name: Minor Stamina Potion
text: During your turn, Recover up to two of your discarded cards.

name: Minor Power Potion
text: During your attack, add +1 Attack to your entire Attack action.

name: Boots of Speed
text: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 10.

name: Cloak of Pockets
text: You can carry two additional small items.

name: Empowering Talisman
text: During your turn, Refresh one of your consumed small items.

name: Battle-Axe
text: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following: (2 adjacent hexes, both adjacent to you)

name: Weighted Net
text: During your ranged attack, add IMMOBILIZE to a single attack.

name: Minor Mana Potion
text: During your turn, create any element.

name: Stun Powder
text: During your attack, add STUN to a single attack.

name: Heavy Greaves
text: You are immune to all forced movement caused by enemies or scenario effects.

name: Chainmail
text: On the next three sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Amulet of Life
text: During your turn, Heal 1 damage.

name: Jagged Sword
text: During your melee attack, add WOUND to a single attack.

name: Long Spear
text: Turn a single-target melee attack into the following: (2 adjacent hexes in a line from the player)

name: Major Healing Potion
text: During your turn, Heal 5 damage.

name: Moon Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items.

name: Comfortable Shoes
text: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card, perform a Move 3 action instead of a Move 2 action.

name: Studded Leather
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain Shield 1 for the attack.

name: Hawk Helm
text: During your ranged attack, add +1 Range to your entire Attack action.

name: Tower Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 2 for the attack.

name: Volatile Bomb
text: During your single-target ranged attack action, turn the attack into the following: (3 adjacent hexes, all adjacent to each other)

name: Major Stamina Potion
text: During your turn, Recover up to three of your discarded cards.

name: Falcon Figurine
text: Summon Jade Falcon (Flying)

name: Boots of Dashing
text: During your movement, add +3 Move to the movement.

name: Robes of Evocation
text: During your attack, consume any element to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Heavy Basinet
text: You are immune to STUN and MUDDLE.

name: Hooked Chain
text: During your ranged attack, add PULL 2 to the entire Attack action.

name: Versatile Dagger
text: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an Attack 3 action instead of an Attack 2 action.

name: Major Power Potion
text: During your attack, add +2 Attack to your entire Attack action.

name: Ring of Haste
text: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the bottom action of the card.

name: Boots of Quickness
text: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 20.

name: Splintmail
text: On the next four sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Pendant of Dark Pacts
text: During your turn, Refresh two of your consumed small items. Gain CURSE.

name: Spiked Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 1 and Retaliate 2 for the attack.

name: Reaping Scythe
text: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following: (3 hexes, all adjacent to the player, and two of which are adjacent to the middle target.)

name: Major Mana Potion
text: During your turn, create any two elements.

name: Sun Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items and Heal 3 damage.

name: Steel Sabatons
text: If you move 1 or fewer hexes on your turn, gain Shield 1 for the round.

name: Shadow Armor
text: When you are damaged by an attack, suffer no damage instead.

name: Protective Charm
text: You are immune to POISON and WOUND.

name: Black Knife
text: During your melee attack, add CURSE to a single attack.

name: Staff of Eminence
text: During your ranged attack, consume any element to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Super Healing Potion
text: During your turn, Heal 7 damage.

name: Ring of Brutality
text: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the top action of the card.

name: Serene Sandals
text: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card perform a Move 4 action instead of a Move 2 action.

name: Cloak of Phasing
text: Gain flying.  While occupying an obstacle hex, you are considered Invisible and cannot attack

name: Telescopic Lens
text: During your ranged attack, add +2 Range to your entire Attack action.

name: Unstable Explosives
text: Turn a single target ranged attack into the following: (4 hex attack, 2 above and 2 below in a parallelogram).  All allies in the attack area suffer 3 damage.

name: Wall Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain Shield 4 for the attack.

name: Doom Powder
text: During your attack, add Stun, Poison, and Curse to a single attack.

name: Lucky Eye
text: During your turn, Strengthen yourself and all adjacent allies.

name: Boots of Sprinting
text: During your movement, add +4 Move to the movement.

name: Platemail
text: On the next five sources of damage to you from attacks, gain Shield 1.

name: Mask of Terror
text: During your melee attack, add Push 1.

name: Balanced Blade
text: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an Attack 4 instead of an Attack 2 action.

name: Halberd
text: During your single target melee attack, you can attack and single enemy within 2 hexes.

name: Star Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh all of your spent items, Heal 3 damage, and Recover up to two of your discarded cards.

name: Second Chance Ring
text: At the end of your turn, play two cards from your hand and perform an additional turn this round based on your new leading initiative (which must be later than your previous initiative).

name: Boots of Levitation
text: Gain Flying

name: Boots of Happiness
text: If you move 6 or more hexes on your turn, gain 1 experience.

name: Blinking Cape
text: During your turn, perform a "Move 4, Jump" action

name: Swordedge Armor
text: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain Shield 1, Retaliate 1

name: Circlet of Elements
text: During your turn, consume any element to create any element

name: Chain Hood
text: While you are adjacent to three or more monsters, gain Shield 1

name: Frigid Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume Ice to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Storm Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume Wind to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Inferno Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume fire to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Tremor Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume Earth to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Brilliant Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume Light to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Night Blade
text: During your melee attack, consume Dark to add +2 Attack to a single attack.

name: Wand of Frost
text: During your turn, create Ice.

name: Wand of Storms
text: During your turn, create Wind.

name: Wand of Infernos
text: During your turn, create Fire.

name: Wand of Tremors
text: During your turn, create Earth.

name: Wand of Brilliance
text: During your turn, create Light.

name: Wand of Darkness
text: During your turn, create Dark.

name: Minor Cure Potion
text: During your turn, remove one negative condition on yourself. This can be used while you have Stun.

name: Major Cure Potion
text: During your turn, remove all negative conditions on yourself. This can be used while you have Stun.

name: Steel Ring
text: When damaged by an attack targeting you, gain Shield 4 for the attack.

name: Dampening Ring
text: Before an enemy would consume an element, consume that element instead for no effect

name: Scroll of Power
text: During an ally's attack, add +1 Attack to their entire attack action

name: Scroll of Healing
text: During your turn, perform a "Heal 3, Range 5" action

name: Scroll of Stamina
text: During your turn, an ally within Range 5 may recover up to two of their discarded cards

name: Rocket Boots
text: During your movement, add +3 Move and Jump to a single movement

name: Endurance Footwraps
text: If you move 4 or more hexes on your turn, perform a ""Heal 1, Self"" action.

name: Drakescale Boots
text: You are unaffected by difficult and hazardous terrain.

name: Magma Waders
text: Ignore the damaging effects of hazardous terrain and perform a ""Heal 2, Self"" action on any turn in which you have entered a hazardous terrain hex.

name: Robes of Summoning
text: During your turn, perform a "Heal 2, target any summoned ally" action.

name: Second Skin
text: Remove two -1 from your attack modifier deck.

name: Sacrificial Robes
text: During your ranged attack, suffer 3 damage to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Drakescale Armor
text: You are immune to Poison and Wound.

name: Steam Armor
text: On the next five sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain Shield 1.

name: Flea-Bitten Shawl
text: You are considered to have an initiative of 99 for the purpose of enemy focusing.

name: Necklace of Teeth
text: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, perform a "Heal 1, Self" action.

name: Horned Helm
text: After moving 4 or more hexes on your turn, add +1 Attack to your next melee attack this turn.

name: Drakescale Helm
text: Whenever you gain Muddle, gain Strengthen instead.

name: Thief's Hood
text: During your ""Loot 1"" ability, perform a ""Loot 2"" ability instead.

name: Helm of the Mountain
text: When attacked, if Earth is Strong, Immobilize the attacker.

name: Wave Crest
text: When attacked, if Ice is Strong, perform a ""Push 2"" action targeting the attacker.

name: Ancient Drill
text: During your melee attack, add +2 Attack and Pierce 2 to the entire Attack action

name: Skullbane Axe
text: During your melee attack targeting a Living Corpse, Living Spirit, or Living Bones, add +5 Attack to a single attack.

name: Staff of Xorn
text: During your ranged attack, add Poison and Muddle to the entire Attack action

name: Mountain Hammer
text: Summon Warrior Spirit

name: Fueled Falchion
text: During your single-target melee attack, the target and all enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage

name: Bloody Axe
text: During your melee attack, suffer 2 damage to add +1 Attack to the entire Attack action.

name: Staff of Elements
text: During your turn, create any element.

name: Skull of Hatred
text: During your turn, Curse all adjacent enemies.

name: Staff of Summoning
text: During your turn, a summoned ally within Range 3 performs a "Move 3" action with you controlling the action.

name: Orb of Dawn
text: During your turn, use Dark to create Light.

name: Orb of Twilight
text: During your turn, use Light to create Dark.

name: Ring of Skulls
text: Summon Skeleton

name: Doomed Compass
text: During your turn, force an enemy within Range 5 to perform a "Move 2" action with you controlling the action.

name: Curious Gear
text: During your turn, disarm all traps within Range 2.

name: Remote Spider
text: During your turn, Poison all adjacent enemies.

name: Giant Remote Spider
text: During your turn, perform a "Loot 1" action.

name: Black Censer
text: During your turn, Muddle all enemies with Range 2.

name: Black Card
text: During your turn, place a character token on an adjacent normal or elite enemy. You add +1 Attack to all your attacks targeting this enemy.

name: Helix Ring
text: During your turn, use light and dark to perform a "Heal 25, Self" action

name: Heart of the Betrayer
text: When attacked by an adjacent normal enemy, force the enemy to attack one of its allies within its range instead

name: Power Core
text: Summon Steel Construct.

name: Resonant Crystal
text: During your turn, destroy an adjacent obstacle.

name: Imposing Blade
text: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, gain Shield 1 for the rest of the round.

name: Focusing Ray
text: During your Heal action, double the value of the Heal.

name: Volatile Elixir
text: During your ranged attack, add +2 Attack and gain Advantage on the entire Attack action, but suffer 2 damage for each attack made.

name: Silent Stiletto
text: Any time you perform a melee attack, add PIERCE 1 to the Attack.

name: Stone Charm
text: During your action where an obstacle is created, create one additional obstacle and apply all effects of the action to it.

name: Psychic Knife
text: Any time you perform an Augment action, add +1 Attack to the entire action.

name: Sun Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, you may consume Light to gain Shield 3 for the attack.

name: Utility Belt
text: During your turn, you or any one ally may Refresh one of your spent or consumed items.

name: Phasing Idol
text: When a summon you own is damaged by an attack, it suffers no damage instead.

name: Smoke Elixir
text: During your turn, gain INVISIBLE and create Dark.

name: Pendant of the Plague
text: During your turn, POISON and CURSE one enemy within Range 3.

name: Mask of Death
text: Any time you perform a melee attack and you have exactly 1 hit point, add +2 Attack to the Attack.

name: Master’s Lute
text: After performing any song action, immediately perform an Attack 2 or Move 2 action.

name: Cloak of the Hunter
text: Any time you perform a Doom action, MUDDLE the target of the Doom.

name: Doctor’s Coat
text: Any time an ally performs a Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack action, they add +1 Heal to their Heal.

name: Elemental Boots
text: If you move 5 or more hexes on your turn, create any element.

name: Staff of Command
text: After performing a Command action, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the same side of the card (top or bottom) as the Command action.
